a.title: Parent and Staff Child Abuse Prevention Training
a.span: Parent and Staff Child Abuse Prevention Training

li.a: Parent and Staff Child Abuse Prevention Training

div.div:
The Oregon Department of Education has approved the school district to serve free lunches and breakfast to all children. Starting March 30th, any child ages 18 years or younger can come to the elementary school parking lot or the entrance of the YCIS school to receive a Grab n Go lunch and breakfast (Curb Side Pick-Up).
Breakfast is intended to be eaten the following morning. Parents may pick up meals without bringing their children to the school if this is more convenient. We are serving from 12:00 12:30 PM, Monday through Friday. We would love to see you, but remember to stay 6 feet apart.
For those who live in the rural areas of Yamhill and Carlton and qualify for free/reduced meals, we have a bus that delivers the meals in the rural bus route drop off points. Therefore, if you are unable to make it to a cafeteria because you live along that route, email communications@ycschools.org with your rural bus route number and how many children will be needing meals.
Weekend meals will be available soon. Information will be updated here upon that notice. Thank you.
En Espanol
El Departamento de Educacin de Oregn ha aprobado que el distrito escolar sirva almuerzos y desayunos gratuitos a todos los nios. A partir del 30 de marzo, cualquier nio de 18 aos o menos puede venir al estacionamiento de la escuela primaria o a la entrada de la escuela YCIS para recibir un almuerzo y desayuno Grab n Go (Recogida en el lado de la acera).
El desayuno se debe comer a la maana siguiente. Los padres pueden recoger comidas sin traer a sus hijos a la escuela si esto es ms conveniente. Atendemos de 12:00 a 12:30 p.m., de lunes a viernes. Nos encantara verte, pero recuerda mantenerte a 6 pies de distancia.
Para aquellos que viven en las reas rurales de Yamhill y Carlton, tenemos un autobs que entrega las comidas en los puntos de entrega de la ruta del autobs rural. Por lo tanto, si no puede llegar a una cafetera porque vive en esa ruta, enve un correo electrnico a communications@ycschools.org con su nmero de ruta de autobs rural y cuntos nios necesitarn comidas.
Las comidas de fin de semana estarn disponibles pronto. La informacin se actualizar aqu despus de ese aviso. Gracias.
120 N Larch Place, Yamhill, OR 97148 | Phone 503-852-6980 | Fax 503-662-4931
